plays.text: Penalty to Marty Reasoner 2 minutes for High Sticking Boyd Devereaux
Goal scored by Sergei Fedorov assisted by Nicklas Lidstrom and Steve Yzerman

Penalty to Jiri Fischer 2 minutes for Tripping Georges Laraque
Penalty to Nicklas Lidstrom 2 minutes for Crosschecking Ryan Smyth
Penalty to Dan Cleary 2 minutes for Goaltender Interference Dominik Hasek
Goal scored by Luc Robitaille assisted by Igor Larionov and Nicklas Lidstrom
Goal scored by Boyd Devereaux assisted by Mathieu Dandenault and Pavel Datsyuk
Goal scored by Sean Brown assisted by Shawn Horcoff and Rem Murray
